snippet.title: PUSHER: DRUG TYCOON - Official Game Reveal Trailer | Gangster Tycoon Management Game
snippet.description:
PUSHER: DRUG TYCOON - COMING TO STEAM – AUGUST 2023!

🎮 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2497210/PUSHER__Drug_Tycoon/

PUSHER - DRUG TYCOON is thrilling business tycoon simulation where you step into the shoes of a drug dealer in 1980s USA.

Enter the world of drug trafficking armed with your pager and gun, where strategy is the key to making great profits.
Your main goal is simple:

BUY LOW and SELL HIGH.

Key Features:
➡️ Trade and Profit: Buy and sell drugs at the right time and price. Keep a keen eye on market fluctuations and trends to make strategic decisions.
➡️ Check the Pager: Catch the best deals coming your way.
➡️ Turn based Fights: Evaluate the risks and decide whether to fight, negotiate for a peaceful solution, or try to escape.
➡️ Money Laundering: You'll deal with cash for your drug transactions but invest in legal assets using the money you've cleaned.
➡️ Bulid you team: Recruit street-smart individuals to help you making money on the streets and legal experts who keep you one step ahead of the authorities.
➡️ Explore Major US Cities: Seek opportunities to sell and buy drugs from coast to coast.
➡️ Confront the Law: The law is keeping a close eye on your every move and won't hesitate to take action against you.
➡️ Spend your money: Buy properties, guns, cars, and pawn shop finds to boost your stats.
➡️ Random events: Get ready for unexpected events that can either help or hurt your business - depending on how you handle them.
➡️ Endless replayability: Experience satisfying gameplay sessions minutes to hours, tailored to your time and mood. Each playthrough is unique, keeping you engaged for hours on end.

🐦 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/P4_GAMES_
💬 Join our Discord community: https://discord.com/invite/aAwxqpWDg3
Official website: https://p4-games.com

Music: Karl Casey @WhiteBatAudio

#gametrailer #tycoon #gangster #gaming #steam

RELEASE: AUGUST 2023

Music: Karl Casey @WhiteBatAudio
